title: Marginal Social Benefit and Marginal Social Cost 1

content.question: What are the socially efficient and market equilibrium quantities?

content.answer: Socially efficient quantity is <math alttext="9" overflow="scroll"><mn>9</mn></math>, and market equilibrium quantity is <math alttext="12" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn></math>.
